entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:07 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:52 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quaqtaq Airport 01:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure: 98.8 kPa
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: ENE 57 km/h gust 70 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
